definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: A little opal can go a long way.
sentences.chinese: 一個小蛋白石可以去長的路。

sentences.english: Opals could be brilliant because they have tiny crystals which could scatter light.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白石閃光是因爲有小的水晶顆粒可以反射光。

sentences.english: There were opals and sapphires, the former in cups of crystal, and the latter in cups of jade.
sentences.chinese: 水晶杯裏盛着蛋白石，碧玉杯裏載着藍寶石。

sentences.english: Spirit found the plateau to be surrounded by deposits of opal.
sentences.chinese: 勇氣號發現高原上有許多蛋白石的沉積物。

sentences.english: Opals could be used to make a sparkling substitute for paint.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白石可以用於製造一種替代塗料的閃光替代品。

sentences.english: That is the reason that opal is so plentiful in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 這是蛋白石的原因，在澳大利亞如此豐富。

sentences.english: He's the one in the Opal Office.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個在蛋白石辦公室。

sentences.english: The expansion of opal slice amounts to 85.
sentences.chinese: 其中蛋白石反應產物的膨脹量達85。

sentences.english: Opals could be brilliant mainly because they have some kind of iridescent properties.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白石閃光的主要是因爲有一種閃光的成分。

sentences.english: We have decided to concentrate on Opal and one other.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經決定把重點放在蛋白石和另外一個。

sentences.english: Think of opal as glass and you will take good care of it automatically .
sentences.chinese: 想到蛋白石玻璃，你會好好照顧它可以自動的。

sentences.english: The ordered opal photonic crystals(PC) with gradient structure have unique photonic properties.
sentences.chinese: 具有梯度結構的蛋白石光子晶體具有獨特的光學性能。
